section.title: Review -- Equivalent Interest Rates
section.p: As you saw at the end of the last activity, we have to pay close attention to the growth rates we are given in a problem. In this activity, we will pause to review converting between equivalent interest rates.

task.p: The effective monthly interest rate is \iota = 3\%. Find the nominal discount rate compounded semiannually.
The nominal interest rate is 6%, convertible quarterly. Find the effective interest rate, compounded every two years.
The force of interest is \delta = 0.045. Find the effective semiannual interest rate.
The effective 3-year discount rate is d = 0.18. Find the annual force of interest.
The effective 3-month interest rate is 2%. Find the nominal interest rate compounded every 3 years.
The nominal discount rate is 1.5%, convertible monthly. Find the effective semiannual interest rate.
